name: chiyogami
description: Chiyogami is a minimal, aesthetic note-taking and journaling web app with markdown support and keyboard shortcuts. It lets users manage plain text notes with elegant design and simple folder-based organization.
features: Aesthetic Notes: Beautiful, minimal note-taking interface. Elegant design.
Markdown Support: Write notes in markdown format. Rich formatting.
Keyboard Shortcuts: Efficient navigation with keyboard. Power user friendly.
Folder Organization: Simple folder-based note organization. Logical structure.
Plain Text: Notes stored as plain text files. Portable format.
Journaling: Perfect for daily journaling and thoughts. Personal reflection.
Self-Hosted: Keep your notes completely private. Data ownership.
